00001 package ScheatorDb;
00002 import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
00003 import java.sql.*;

00009 public class Series extends DbObject {
00010 
00012     private static final String[] TABLE_NAME = {"Series"};
00014     private static final String ID_FIELD = "ID";
00016     private static final String[] FIELDS = {"ID", "Name"};
00017 
00026     public Series() {
00027         list = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, Data>();
00028         db = new MySqlDb();
00029         fetch(0);
00030     }
00031 
00036     public final void fetch(int key) {
00037         this.currentId = key;
00038         list.clear();
00039         String[] idFields = null;
00040         String[] ids = null;
00041         if (key != 0) {
00042             idFields[0] = "season";
00043             ids[0] = String.valueOf(currentId);
00044         }
00045         
00046         try {
00047             Statement st = db.con.createStatement();
00048             ResultSet rs = st.executeQuery(db.qe.getItems(TABLE_NAME, null, idFields , ids, null));
00049             while (rs.next()) {
00050                 String id = rs.getString(FIELDS[0]);
00051                 String name = rs.getString(FIELDS[1]);
00052                 Data series = new Data(Integer.parseInt(id.trim()), name);
00053                 list.put(id, series);
00054             }
00055         } catch (Exception e) {
00056             System.err.println("Failed to read series data: " + e.toString());
00057         }
00058     }
00059 
00063     public class Data extends DbObject.Data {
00064 
00069         Data(String name) {
00070             this.field_id = null;
00071             this.field_name = name;
00072         }
00073 
00079         Data(Integer id, String name) {
00080             this.field_id = id;
00081             this.field_name = name;
00082         }
00083     }
00084 }
